alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 1:46PM EST until February 19 at 4:16AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Warren. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding will affect property along Tod Avenue and Lovers Lane Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 10.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 05/23/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1145 PM EST.
